comment: Every year the flu jab is changed to account for the seasonable variation. It doesnt take years to test a vaccine. At school when I was little kids wore callipers from polio and died from simple diseases like measles. The vaccine went through the same safety checks just quicker
amr:
# ::snt Every year the flu jab is changed to account for the seasonable variation. It doesnt take years to test a vaccine. At school when I was little kids wore callipers from polio and died from simple diseases like measles. The vaccine went through the same safety checks just quicker
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / change-01
            :ARG1 (j / jab
                  :mod (d / disease
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "influenza")))
            :purpose (a / account-01
                  :ARG0 j
                  :ARG1 (v / vary-01
                        :ARG1-of (s / season-01
                              :ARG1-of (p / possible-01))))
            :frequency (r / rate-entity-91
                  :ARG3 (t / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (y / year))))
      :snt2 (t2 / take-10
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (t3 / test-01
                  :ARG1 (v2 / vaccine))
            :ARG1 (m2 / multiple
                  :op1 (t4 / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (y2 / year))))
      :snt3 (a2 / and
            :op1 (w / wear-01
                  :ARG0 (k / kid
                        :mod (l / little)
                        :domain (ii / i))
                  :ARG1 (c2 / calliper)
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (d2 / disease
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Poliomyelitis"))))
            :op2 (d3 / die-01
                  :ARG1 k
                  :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (d4 / disease
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / simple-02)
                              :example (m3 / measles))))
            :location (s3 / school))
      :snt4 (g / go-through-20
            :ARG0 (v3 / vaccine)
            :ARG1 (c5 / check-01
                  :purpose (s4 / safe-01)
                  :ARG1-of (s5 / same-01))
            :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG2 (q / quick-02
                        :ARG1 g)
                  :ARG3 (m4 / more
                        :mod (j2 / just)))))

comment: Lucky people never said this about TB, diphtheria, smallpox or we would all be fucking dead. Grow up and shut up, nobody is forcing you to act responsibly.
amr:
# ::snt Lucky people never said this about TB, diphtheria, smallpox or we would all be fucking dead. Grow up and shut up, nobody is forcing you to act responsibly.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :mod (l / lucky))

                  :op1 (d / disease
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "TB"))
                  :op2 (d2 / disease
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "diphtheria"))
                  :op3 (d3 / disease
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Smallpox"))
                  :op4 (d4 / die-01
                        :ARG1 (w / we
                              :mod (a / all))
                        :mod (f / fuck)))
            :time (e / ever))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (g / grow-up-04
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG1 (y / you))
            :op2 (s2 / shut-up-06
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y)
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (f2 / force-01
                        :ARG0 (n4 / nobody)
                        :ARG1 y

                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1-of (r / responsible-02))))))
